original_text: I rejoiced greatly in the Lord that at last you renewed your concern for me. Indeed, you were concerned, but you had no opportunity to show it.
korean_text: 내가 주 안에서 크게 기뻐함은 너희가 나를 생각하던 것이 이제 다시 싹이 남이니 너희가 또한 이를 위하여 생각은 하였으나 기회가 없었느니라

sentences.original_text: I rejoiced greatly in the Lord
that at last you renewed your concern for me
sentences.korean_translation: 마침내 당신이 나를 향한 관심을 새롭게 했다는 사실을

sentences.original_text: but you had no opportunity to show it
